message.entry: The init method must be called before any other simulator method and before creating the nodes.
Adding of nodes to the simulator during the simulation is not supported.
The node with ID ({0}) is already added to the simulator.
Default channel model supports single-input single-output (SISO) scenarios. Custom channel model must be added to simulate non-SISO scenarios.
Unable to send the packet because the node with ID ({0}) was not added to the simulator.
